response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this exceptional opportunity to you. This product is truly unique and holds immense value for its next owner. Given its rarity and quality, I believe it's worth more than what many might initially think. Considering all its features and benefits, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $15,000. This is an opportunity not just to own a valuable item, but also to secure a piece of something special that could appreciate in value over time.
